We are actively developing data science workshops, which are meant to supplement the MEDS curriculum and teach additional skills. Find links to our teaching materials below.

## Fall Workshops

```{r, echo = FALSE}
##############################
# add links
##############################

# CSS
fall_workshops[1,5] <- cell_spec("link",  "html", link = "https://ucsb-meds.github.io/customizing-websites-css/#1")
fall_workshops[1,6] <- cell_spec("link",  "html", link = "https://github.com/UCSB-MEDS/customizing-websites-css")

# Blog
fall_workshops[2,5] <- cell_spec("link",  "html", link = "https://samanthacsik.github.io/posts/2021-09-21-my-first-test-post/")
fall_workshops[2,6] <- cell_spec("link",  "html", link = "https://github.com/UCSB-MEDS/writing-blogposts")

# Google

##############################
# build table 
##############################

fall_workshops %>% 
  kable(col.names = c("Date", "Workshop title", "Description", "Approximate duration", "Presentation materials", "GitHub repo"), format = "html", escape = FALSE) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped") %>% 
  kableExtra::row_spec(1, extra_css = "border-bottom: 1px solid gainsboro") 
```
